text: Roger Earl Mosley (; December 18, 1938 â€“ August 7, 2022) was an American actor, director, and writer. He was best known for his role as the helicopter pilot Theodore "T.C." Calvin in the CBS television series Magnum, P.I.. On August 4, 2022, Mosley was in a car accident in Lynwood, California, becoming paralyzed from the shoulders down. He died three days later from his injuries at a Los Angeles hospital at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television directors Category:American television writers Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:Road accident deaths in California
title: Roger E. Mosley
